text: Christian Alexander Jojo (born 11 February 1999) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender for Hong Kong Premier League club Eastern. He also holds a Swedish passport. ==Career== On 29 August 2019, Jojo signed his first professional contract with Hong Kong Premier League club Happy Valley.
